name: Infinity Leap
description:
A game I made as a school project. Play as one of the warriors of the sky, and fight as hard as you can to beat the evil skulls. The Game supports 1-4 players, has 3 different environments, 4 characters and 5 different weapons.

Local multiplayer supported up to 4 players with keyboard + 2 gamepads.

1) On keyboard A/D to move, N/M to jump and shoot.

2) On gamepad left joystick to move, 1/2 to jump and shoot.

3) On divided gamepad left/right joystick to move, buttons on back side to jump and shoot.

Esc - pause, in lobby button 2/3 will show which controller you're using.

Disclaimer! If you play with divided gamepads, remember to check mode settings.

Minor scaling and color Changes were made.
